about_me.name: Md. Rifat Hossain
about_me.about_me: Hi, I'm Md. Rifat Hossain, a passionate software engineer, currently working at Siderian Cloud (Nederland). With a focus on designing, developing, and maintaining software, I thrive on solving intricate software problems. My love for embracing new technologies has led me to specialize in Angular and the .NET framework. Currently, I'm diving into the world of DevOps and exploring the realm of microservices for the current project. My ability to quickly learn and adapt to any programming language sets me apart in the dynamic field of software engineering.
